title: Pivot Cycles Premier Lifetime Warranty and Bearing Replacement Program
content:
We’ve discussed why Pivot Cycles are a premium and now we can add two more features that could be worth it to potential buyers, a new lifetime warranty and bearing replacement program. Let’s check it out…

Pivot Premier Lifetime Warranty

Effective for bikes sold on or after January 1, 2024, the Pivot Premier Lifetime Warranty offers lifetime coverage on frames for the original owner. This warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship, providing long-term confidence in every ride.

To qualify, bikes must be registered within 30 days of purchase or by April 1, 2025, whichever comes later. Bikes purchased and registered in 2024 are automatically enrolled for lifetime coverage. Bikes that are not registered will retain a 3-year frame warranty, but registration unlocks the full benefits of lifetime protection.

Courtesy Bearing Replacement Program

As part of our dedication to durability and performance, Pivot Cycles is excited to offer lifetime replacement for frame linkage bearings. While Pivot’s precision-engineered bearings are designed to last, this program ensures riders are covered in the rare instance a replacement is needed.

The Courtesy Bearing Replacement Program IS NOT a warranty. Customers are responsible for labor costs associated with bearing replacement; however, resources and guides for DIY replacement are available in the Pivot Pro Garage.
